function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Shut down of public spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining physical distance in densely-populated cities","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases due to close contact and social interaction","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption to manufacturing businesses","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low levels of animal pharmaceuticals from large drug suppliers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through the handling of waste materials from households and quarantine facilities with covid-19 patients.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of covid-19, similar to previous outbreaks like sars-cov, necessitating further research and risk management actions.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of novel rna viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential vulnerabilities in waste and wastewater management due to widespread community infection and quarantining","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown variability in sars-cov-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unpublished data on infectious sars-cov-2 in faecal samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential transmission of diseases through air vents and plumbing systems in housing complexes.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater, indicating potential presence of the virus.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Genetic similarity of sars-cov-2 to sars-cov, and potential for faecal-oral transmission.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in waste collection time of 72 hours","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of viral aerosols through wastewater systems","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential role of the environment in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Nature","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Likelihood of additional transmission mechanisms in confined spaces with dense populations","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission via fomites, aerosols, and faecal-oral route","category":"Transmission","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on surfaces for several days","category":"Transmission","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via contaminated objects and surfaces","category":"Transmission","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around viral shedding from asymptomatic carriers","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 in waste and wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of virus transmission in the built environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the virus structure and implications for waste management","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial impacts on waste and wastewater industries","category":"Waste Management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improperly configured, maintained, or cleaned ventilation system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor air circulation and constant air movement","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extended short-range aerosol transmission of the virus in crowded and poorly ventilated enclosures","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-range aerosol transmission due to low ventilation rate","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination and spread in indoor dining settings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation and air filtration.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential leakage of exhaust air back into the air supply due to energy recovery ventilation systems.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited registered products for sanitizing ductwork, especially for fiber glass duct board or fiber glass lined ducts","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of dissemination of infectious aerosols in buildings","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insulation harboring microbiological growths due to lack of maintenance","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain safety and effectiveness of sealants for duct surfaces","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for contaminants to enter the space during cleaning","category":"Air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor maintenance of insulation leading to iaq issues","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Microbiological growth in insulation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to meet cleaning standards for hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regular cleaning and maintenance of hvac systems can lead to the buildup of dirt, mold, and other contaminants, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the air.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of dirty filters during replacement can lead to the spread of biologic particles, including molds, bacteria, and viruses, posing a risk of contamination to individuals involved in maintenance activities.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reentrainment of exhausted effluents into the hvac system due to engineering problems can result in the spread of contaminants and increase the risk of airborne transmission of diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air flow may result in poor indoor air quality and contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of odors in the building may indicate the presence of unsanitary conditions or mold growth, which can contribute to the spread of diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"}]}
